sentence: I thought the book was boring, pero cuando lo abrí, it turned out to be a thrilling mystery.
I was sure the movie was a comedy, pero cuando empezó, it turned out to be a horror film.
Cuando llegué a la fiesta, I realized that the music was so loud, pero it was actually just my phone ringing.
I thought the concert was classical, pero cuando empezó, it turned out to be a rock festival.
I assumed the restaurant was closed, pero cuando entré, it turned out to be a surprise party for me.
